mapper.insert: insert into pms_product_attribute_category (id, `name`, attribute_count, param_count) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attributeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paramCount,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select id, `name`, attribute_count, param_count from pms_product_attribute_category
